headline.main: SENATORS IN SECRET TURN TO POST WAR; Seven Pending Resolutions Are Before Foreign Relations Subcommittee of 8

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 31 -- With all members pledged to strict secrecy, the special Senate Foreign Relations subcommittee on postwar problems began consideration today of pending resolutions calling for United Nations cooperation and joint action in maintaining the peace after the second World War.
abstract: US Sen subcom studies pending Ball-Burton-Hatch-Hill resolutions; Connally comments; 4 Sens wives broadcast on resolution; Ball and Hatch urge resolution adoption, radio ss
